### Practical Implications

- **BM25 Strengths:**  
  - Extremely fast, scalable, easy to explain/tune
  - Robust for keyword-centric, technical or legal search, where lexical match is critical
  - Strong baseline method, still the backbone of production search (often as a first-stage filter)

- **Neural Model Strengths:**  
  - Can retrieve relevant results even when there‚Äôs no word overlap (synonyms, paraphrase)
  - Handles conversational or intent-driven queries, multi-hop reasoning
  - Readily supports did-you-mean, question answering, and context-rich tasks
